languages.text: "Неужели ты успел{mf||а} забыть, кто именно повинен в гибели Крудараха, элантах?" {n}Камень Душ Ирлиэт вспыхивает ярким светом, а глаза — осуждением.{/n} "Мои собратья повинны лишь в том, что приблизились слишком близко к звездам мон-кай. Они... Мы лишились дома. Были гонимы твоим народом. Были терзаемы темными. Нет... Никто из детей Крударахе не заслужил подобной участи. И я не позволю сгинуть во тьме оставшимся".

"Have you already forgotten who is responsible for Crudarach's demise, elantach?" {n}Yrliet's spirit stone glows brightly, but the disapproval in her eyes is even brighter.{/n} "The only thing my kin are guilty of is getting too close to the stars of the mon-keigh. They... We... lost our home. We were hounded by your people. We were tormented by dark ones. No... None of Crudarach's children deserve such a fate. And I will not let those who yet remain perish in darkness."
languages.original_text: "Неужели ты успел{mf||а} забыть, кто именно повинен в гибели Крудараха, элантах?" {n}Камень Душ Ирлиэт вспыхивает ярким светом, а глаза — осуждением.{/n} "Мои собратья повинны лишь в том, что приблизились слишком близко к звездам мон-кай. Они... Мы лишились дома. Были гонимы твоим народом. Были терзаемы темными. Нет... Никто из детей Крударахе не заслужил подобной участи. И я не позволю сгинуть во тьме оставшимся".

They... We lost our home. Were hounded by your people. Were tormented by dark ones. No... None of the Crudarach's children deserve such a fate. And I will not let those who yet remain perish in darkness."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Has olvidado quién fue el artífice de la destrucción de Crudarach, elantach?». {n}La joya espiritual de Yrliet emite un fuerte brillo, pero la desaprobación de su mirada es aún más intensa.{/n} «La única culpa que puede atribuirse a mi especie es la de habernos acercado demasiado a las estrellas de los mon-keigh. Han... Hemos... perdido nuestro hogar. Los tuyos nos hostigaron. Los oscuros nos atormentaron. No... Ningún hijo de Crudarach merecía semejante destino. Y no pienso permitir que los escasos supervivientes perezcan en las tinieblas».
languages.original_text: "Have you already forgotten who is responsible for Crudarach's demise, elantach?" {n}Yrliet's spirit stone glows brightly, but the disapproval in her eyes is even brighter.{/n} "The only thing my kin are guilty of is getting too close to the stars of the mon-keigh. They... We... lost our home. We were hounded by your people. We were tormented by dark ones. No... None of Crudarach's children deserve such a fate. And I will not let those who yet remain perish in darkness."

traits.locale_text: «¿Has olvidado quién fue el artífice de la destrucción de Crudarach, elantach?». {n}La joya espiritual de Yrliet emite un fuerte brillo, pero la desaprobación de su mirada es aún más intensa.{/n} «La única culpa que puede atribuirse a mi especie es la de habernos acercado demasiado a las estrellas de los mon-keigh. Han... Hemos perdido nuestro hogar. Los tuyos nos hostigaron. Los oscuros nos atormentaron. No... Ningún hijo de Crudarach merecía semejante destino. Y no pienso permitir que los escasos supervivientes perezcan en las tinieblas».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “莫非你已经忘了，是谁该为克鲁达拉赫的灭亡负责了吗？”{n}伊莉耶特的灵魂石闪闪发光，但她眼中的不满之意比灵魂石更加明亮。{/n}“我的族人唯一犯下的罪过，就是他们太靠近猴子的星系了。他们……我们……失去了我们的家园，我们被你们的人追杀，我们被黑暗子嗣折磨。克鲁达拉赫的子嗣根本……根本不该落得这样的命运，我不能让剩下的人在黑暗中消亡。”
languages.original_text: "Have you already forgotten who is responsible for Crudarach's demise, elantach?" {n}Yrliet's spirit stone glows brightly, but the disapproval in her eyes is even brighter.{/n} "The only thing my kin are guilty of is getting too close to the stars of the mon-keigh. They... We... lost our home. We were hounded by your people. We were tormented by dark ones. No... None of Crudarach's children deserve such a fate. And I will not let those who yet remain perish in darkness."

traits.locale_text: “莫非你已经忘了，是谁该为克鲁达拉赫的灭亡负责了吗？”{n}伊莉耶特的灵魂石闪闪发光，但她眼中的不满之意比灵魂石更加明亮。{/n}“我的族人唯一犯下的罪过，就是他们太靠近猴子的星系了。他们……我们失去了家园，我们被你们的人追杀，我们被黑暗子嗣折磨。克鲁达拉赫的子嗣根本……根本不该落得这样的命运，我不能让剩下的人在黑暗中消亡。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Avez-vous déjà oublié qui est responsable de la destruction de Crudarach, elantach ? » {n}La pierre-esprit d'Yrliet se met à briller, mais la lueur de désapprobation dans son regard est plus vive encore.{/n} « La seule chose dont mon peuple s'est rendu coupable, c'est de s'être trop approché des étoiles des mon-keigh. Ils... Nous... avons perdu notre monde, vos semblables nous ont pris en chasse et les Drukharis nous ont torturés. Non... Aucun des enfants de Crudarach ne mérite un tel sort, et je ne laisserai pas les survivants périr dans les ténèbres. »
languages.original_text: "Have you already forgotten who is responsible for Crudarach's demise, elantach?" {n}Yrliet's spirit stone glows brightly, but the disapproval in her eyes is even brighter.{/n} "The only thing my kin are guilty of is getting too close to the stars of the mon-keigh. They... We... lost our home. We were hounded by your people. We were tormented by dark ones. No... None of Crudarach's children deserve such a fate. And I will not let those who yet remain perish in darkness."

traits.locale_text: « Avez-vous déjà oublié qui est responsable de la destruction de Crudarach, elantach ? » {n}La pierre-esprit d'Yrliet se met à briller, mais la lueur de désapprobation dans son regard est plus vive encore.{/n} « La seule chose dont mon peuple s'est rendu coupable, c'est de s'être trop approché des étoiles des mon-keigh. Ils... Nous avons perdu notre monde, vos semblables nous ont pris en chasse et les Drukharis nous ont torturés. Non... Aucun des enfants de Crudarach ne mérite un tel sort, et je ne laisserai pas les survivants périr dans les ténèbres. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「クルダラの死は誰のせいなのか、もう忘れたのか、エランタ？」{n}ユリエットの魂縛石は輝きを放つが、その瞳に宿る不服はさらに輝きを増している。{/n}「私の血族が罪を犯したのは、モン＝ケイの星に近づきすぎたことだけだ。彼らは…我々は故郷を失った。あなたたちに追い回された。闇の者たちに苦しめられた。いや…クルダラの子らは誰一人、そのような運命に値するものではない。そして、まだ残っている者たちを暗闇の中で滅びさせはしない」
languages.original_text: "Have you already forgotten who is responsible for Crudarach's demise, elantach?" {n}Yrliet's spirit stone glows brightly, but the disapproval in her eyes is even brighter.{/n} "The only thing my kin are guilty of is getting too close to the stars of the mon-keigh. They... We... lost our home. We were hounded by your people. We were tormented by dark ones. No... None of Crudarach's children deserve such a fate. And I will not let those who yet remain perish in darkness."

traits.locale_text: 「クルダラの死は誰のせいなのか、もう忘れたのか、エランタ？」{n}ユリエットの魂縛石は輝きを放つが、その瞳に宿る不服はさらに輝きを増している。{/n}「私の血族が罪を犯したのは、モン＝ケイの星に近づきすぎたことだけだ。彼らは…我々は故郷を失った。あなたたちに追い回された。闇の者たちに苦しめられた。いや…クルダラの子らは誰一人、そのような運命に値するものではない。そして、まだ残っている者たちを暗闇の中で滅びさせはしない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Habt Ihr schon vergessen, wer für den Niedergang von Crudarach verantwortlich ist, Elantach?" {n}Yrliets Seelenstein strahlt hell, doch die Missbilligung in ihren Augen ist noch heller.{/n} "Mein Volk hat sich nur eines zu Schulden kommen lassen: Den Sternen der Chem-Pan-Sey zu nah gekommen zu sein. Sie ... Wir haben unsere Heimat verloren. Wir wurden von Eurem Volk gejagt. Wir wurden von Dunklen gepeinigt. Nein ... Keines von Crudarachs Kindern hat ein solches Schicksal verdient. Und ich lasse nicht zu, dass die wenigen, die noch übrig sind, in der Dunkelheit verenden."
languages.original_text: "Have you already forgotten who is responsible for Crudarach's demise, elantach?" {n}Yrliet's spirit stone glows brightly, but the disapproval in her eyes is even brighter.{/n} "The only thing my kin are guilty of is getting too close to the stars of the mon-keigh. They... We... lost our home. We were hounded by your people. We were tormented by dark ones. No... None of Crudarach's children deserve such a fate. And I will not let those who yet remain perish in darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr schon vergessen, wer für den Niedergang von Crudarach verantwortlich ist, Elantach?" {n}Yrliets Seelenstein strahlt hell, doch die Missbilligung in ihren Augen ist noch heller.{/n} "Mein Volk hat sich nur eines zu Schulden kommen lassen: Den Sternen der Chem-Pan-Sey zu nah gekommen zu sein. Sie ... Wir haben unsere Heimat verloren. Wir wurden von Eurem Volk gejagt. Wir wurden von Dunklen gepeinigt. Nein ... Keines von Crudarachs Kindern hat ein solches Schicksal verdient. Und ich lasse nicht zu, dass die wenigen, die noch übrig sind, in der Dunkelheit verenden."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Crudarach'ın çöküşünden kimin sorumlu olduğu, çoktan hafızandan silindi mi elantach?" {n}Yrliet'in ruh taşı, kıvılcımlar saçarcasına parlarken kınayan gözleri ise âdeta alev alev yanıyor.{/n} "Soydaşlarımın suçlu olduğu tek husus, mon-keighlerin yıldızlarına çok fazla yaklaşmaları. Onlar... Biz... Yuvamızı kaybettik. Halkın peşimize düştü. Karalar'ın eziyetlerine maruz kaldık. Hayır... Crudarach'ın hiçbir çocuğu, böyle bir kaderi hak etmiyor. Ben de hâlâ hayatta olanların karanlıkta yitip gitmelerine izin vermeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Have you already forgotten who is responsible for Crudarach's demise, elantach?" {n}Yrliet's spirit stone glows brightly, but the disapproval in her eyes is even brighter.{/n} "The only thing my kin are guilty of is getting too close to the stars of the mon-keigh. They... We... lost our home. We were hounded by your people. We were tormented by dark ones. No... None of Crudarach's children deserve such a fate. And I will not let those who yet remain perish in darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Crudarach'ın çöküşünden kimin sorumlu olduğu, çoktan hafızandan silindi mi elantach?" {n}Yrliet'in ruh taşı, kıvılcımlar saçarcasına parlasa da gözlerindeki kınama, âdeta alev alev yanıyor.{/n} "Soydaşlarımın suçlu olduğu tek husus, mon-keighlerin yıldızlarına çok fazla yaklaşmaları. Onlar... Biz... Yuvamızı kaybettik. Halkın peşimize düştü. Karaların eziyetlerine maruz kaldık. Hayır... Crudarach'ın hiçbir çocuğu, böyle bir kaderi hak etmiyor. Ben de hâlâ hayatta olanların karanlıkta yitip gitmelerine izin vermeyeceğim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
